com.cmput301w20t10.uberapp.database.base

Class EntityBase<Field>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w20t10.uberapp.database.base.DatabaseObjectBase<Field>
      • com.cmput301w20t10.uberapp.database.base.EntityBase<Field>
  • Type Parameters:
    Field - T should be of type enum where the fields represent the fields in the database. It should override Object.toString(), returning camel case version of these fields.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DriverEntity, RiderEntity, RideRequestEntity, TransactionEntity, UnpairedRideEntity, UserEntity

    public abstract class EntityBase<Field>
extends DatabaseObjectBase<Field>
    Base class for all Entity and Model classes. It is structured to detect dirty fields by adding the state on the dirty field list if set is ever used.
